project.name: C-C834A-GIMP-06-ST03-DT06-DF15-CF01-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C834A-GIMP-06-ST03-DT06-DF15-CF01-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved jpg file Takes an integer as input, and determine if the integer is prime using the truly stupid method of seeing if every natural number less than it will divide into it. If the integer is a large prime number, the program will loop excessively.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="68718952445" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C834A-GIMP-06-ST03-DT06-DF15-CF01-01-BAD-01
iopair.description:
Takes an integer as input, and determine if the integer is prime using the truly stupid method of seeing if every natural number less than it will divide into it. If the integer is a large prime number, the program will loop excessively.
This input causes the program to excessively loop, slowing it down. However, the exploit will still result in successful execution. There is currently nothing better to check for long execution. Thus, we simply check the original good output to ensure it ran fully.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="1073676287" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-09 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
